creator: Bitdefender
descriptionHtml:
Take Bitdefender’s award-winning antivirus protection with you!

Bitdefender's Antivirus Free is a powerful and fast solution that uses in-the-cloud scanning technology to arm your Android device with the very latest industry leading virus detection. Without slowing down your Android or draining your battery. Simply install on your Android and it’s ready to go—nothing to configure.

And it's totally free!

Unparalleled Detection
Autopilot automatically scans any new apps that are downloaded to your Android device for viruses. Antivirus Free uses the same scanning engines as Bitdefender Mobile Security-our flagship mobile security app that has been independently certified to catch more than 99% of all viruses targeted at Android devices. This powerful scanner keeps you protected 24/7 against malicious activities.

Feather-Light Performance
Instead of downloading and storing virus signatures directly to Android devices, Antivirus Free uses in-the-cloud services to check online for the latest safeguards to outbreaks. This not only results in super-fast scans, but in close to zero impact on battery life and device performance.

Hassle-Free Operation
Don't worry. Ever. You can sleep but Autopilot, a smart on-install scanner that checks all apps for suspicious activity, won't. Threats and viruses are blocked before any damage is done.

Zero Configuration
Bitdefender Antivirus Free offers you essential antivirus protection against all Android threats. It is ready to go right after installation, acting as an effective guardian against mobile malware. Moreover, the Autopilot automatically scans any new apps you install.

Upgrade to Total Security for Android Devices
Upgrade to Bitdefender Mobile Security, and you’ll not only continue to enjoy the same features as above, but also gain an array of additional cutting-edge capabilities. They include the real-time scanning of pages you're viewing online, as well as the ability to lock, locate, and wipe your Android device in case it becomes lost or stolen.

Download the 14-day Trial Version now – http://bit.ly/IaeJ0g

title: Bitdefender Antivirus Free

container.value:

15A Orhideelor St.
Orhideea Towers, district 6
Bucharest, 060071, Romania

creator: Bitdefender
descriptionHtml:
Take Bitdefender’s award-winning antivirus protection with you!

Bitdefender's Antivirus Free is a powerful and fast solution that uses in-the-cloud scanning technology to arm your Android device with the very latest industry leading virus detection. Without slowing down your Android or draining your battery. Simply install on your Android and it’s ready to go—nothing to configure.

And it's totally free!

Unparalleled Detection
Autopilot automatically scans any new apps that are downloaded to your Android device for viruses. Antivirus Free uses the same scanning engines as Bitdefender Mobile Security-our flagship mobile security app that has been independently certified to catch more than 99% of all viruses targeted at Android devices. This powerful scanner keeps you protected 24/7 against malicious activities.

Feather-Light Performance
Instead of downloading and storing virus signatures directly to Android devices, Antivirus Free uses in-the-cloud services to check online for the latest safeguards to outbreaks. This not only results in super-fast scans, but in close to zero impact on battery life and device performance.

Hassle-Free Operation
Don't worry. Ever. You can sleep but Autopilot, a smart on-install scanner that checks all apps for suspicious activity, won't. Threats and viruses are blocked before any damage is done.

Zero Configuration
Bitdefender Antivirus Free offers you essential antivirus protection against all Android threats. It is ready to go right after installation, acting as an effective guardian against mobile malware. Moreover, the Autopilot automatically scans any new apps you install.

Upgrade to Total Security for Android Devices
Upgrade to Bitdefender Mobile Security, and you’ll not only continue to enjoy the same features as above, but also gain an array of additional cutting-edge capabilities. They include the real-time scanning of pages you're viewing online, as well as the ability to lock, locate, and wipe your Android device in case it becomes lost or stolen.

Download the 14-day Trial Version now – http://bit.ly/IaeJ0g

Bitdefender Antivirus Free is a powerful antivirus app with ultra-fast virus scanner, removal and virus cleaner capabilities. It is especially designed to keep your Android device safe from malware, viruses, ransomware, adware and trojans posing as legitimate apps, no matter their install source.
You get maximum protection without slowing down your phone or draining your battery. Simply install the app on your Android and it’s ready to go - nothing to configure.

And it's totally free!

Downloaded by millions of people, Bitdefender Antivirus Free keeps every Android phone safe using in-the-cloud scanning technology and the very latest industry leading virus detection. Join now to get:

✔ Free Antivirus
✔ Free Virus Cleaner
✔ On-Install Virus Scanner
✔ On-Demand Virus Scanner
Unparalleled Virus Detection
This powerful virus scanner keeps you protected 24/7 against all online threats. Bitdefender automatically scans any new apps that are downloaded to your Android device for viruses.

Feather-Light Performance
You get super-fast virus scans, with no impact on battery life and phone performance. Instead of downloading and storing virus signatures directly to Android devices, Bitdefender Antivirus Free uses in-the-cloud services to check online for the latest safeguards to outbreaks.

Hassle-Free App Protection
Put your security on autopilot. The included smart on-install virus scanner checks all apps for suspicious activity, making sure your Android phone is always protected. Threats and viruses are detected and blocked before any damage is done.

Zero Configuration
Bitdefender Antivirus Free offers you essential antivirus protection against all Android threats. It is ready to go right after installation, acting as an effective guardian against mobile viruses and online threats.

What Else Do You Get?

On-Install Scanning
Bitdefender Antivirus Free automatically scans any new apps you install, to make sure your smartphone is not at risk. You always stay informed and protected.

On-Demand Scanning
With Bitdefender Antivirus Free, on-demand virus scans may be run at any time, to make sure that all the applications that are installed and kept in the device’s storage are legitimate and safe.

In need of more than antivirus protection? We have you covered.

Upgrade to Bitdefender Mobile Security, and you’ll not only continue to enjoy the same virus protection features as above, but also gain an array of additional cutting-edge capabilities like scam alerts, phishing protection, real time malicious behavior alerts. Keep your browsing safe with real-time scanning of pages viewed online. You'll also gain the ability to lock, locate, and wipe your Android device in case it becomes lost or stolen.
Try it free for the first 14 days.

Bitdefender Antivirus uses foreground services (TYPE_SPECIAL_USE), so it can catch all the PACKAGE_INSTALLED events as soon as possible in order to scan all the apps installed or updated before the user access them which represents the main feature of the app.
descriptionShort: Free Antivirus. Powerful Virus Cleaner. Top Virus Scanner & Remover

Bucharest, 060071, Romania

creator: Bitdefender
descriptionHtml:
Take Bitdefender’s award-winning antivirus protection with you!

Bitdefender Antivirus Free is a powerful antivirus app with ultra-fast virus scanner, removal and virus cleaner capabilities. It is especially designed to keep your Android device safe from malware, viruses, ransomware, adware and trojans posing as legitimate apps, no matter their install source.
You get maximum protection without slowing down your phone or draining your battery. Simply install the app on your Android and it’s ready to go - nothing to configure.

And it's totally free!

Downloaded by millions of people, Bitdefender Antivirus Free keeps every Android phone safe using in-the-cloud scanning technology and the very latest industry leading virus detection. Join now to get:

✔ Free Antivirus
✔ Free Virus Cleaner
✔ On-Install Virus Scanner
✔ On-Demand Virus Scanner
Unparalleled Virus Detection
This powerful virus scanner keeps you protected 24/7 against all online threats. Bitdefender automatically scans any new apps that are downloaded to your Android device for viruses.

Feather-Light Performance
You get super-fast virus scans, with no impact on battery life and phone performance. Instead of downloading and storing virus signatures directly to Android devices, Bitdefender Antivirus Free uses in-the-cloud services to check online for the latest safeguards to outbreaks.

Hassle-Free App Protection
Put your security on autopilot. The included smart on-install virus scanner checks all apps for suspicious activity, making sure your Android phone is always protected. Threats and viruses are detected and blocked before any damage is done.

Zero Configuration
Bitdefender Antivirus Free offers you essential antivirus protection against all Android threats. It is ready to go right after installation, acting as an effective guardian against mobile viruses and online threats.

What Else Do You Get?

On-Install Scanning
Bitdefender Antivirus Free automatically scans any new apps you install, to make sure your smartphone is not at risk. You always stay informed and protected.

On-Demand Scanning
With Bitdefender Antivirus Free, on-demand virus scans may be run at any time, to make sure that all the applications that are installed and kept in the device’s storage are legitimate and safe.

In need of more than antivirus protection? We have you covered.

Upgrade to Bitdefender Mobile Security, and you’ll not only continue to enjoy the same virus protection features as above, but also gain an array of additional cutting-edge capabilities like scam alerts, phishing protection, real time malicious behavior alerts. Keep your browsing safe with real-time scanning of pages viewed online. You'll also gain the ability to lock, locate, and wipe your Android device in case it becomes lost or stolen.
Try it free for the first 14 days.

Bitdefender Antivirus uses foreground services (TYPE_SPECIAL_USE), so it can catch all the PACKAGE_INSTALLED events as soon as possible in order to scan all the apps installed or updated before the user access them which represents the main feature of the app.
descriptionShort: Free Antivirus. Powerful Virus Cleaner. Top Virus Scanner & Remover
